Package in.co.rays.Proj4.model

Class MarksheetModel

  • java.lang.Object
    • in.co.rays.Proj4.model.MarksheetModel
  • public class MarksheetModel
extends java.lang.Object
    The MarksheetModel class provides operations for managing student marksheet records in the database. It supports typical CRUD operations such as add, update, delete, and search. It also allows fetching a merit list and checking for duplicate roll numbers.

    This model interacts with:

    • MarksheetBean - to carry data between layers
    • StudentModel - to retrieve student details
    • JDBCDataSource - for connection pooling

    Author:
    Sanjana Gangrade

        public long add​(MarksheetBean bean)
         throws ApplicationException,
                DuplicateRecordException
        Adds a new Marksheet to the database.
        Parameters:
        bean - the MarksheetBean containing marksheet data
        Returns:
        the primary key of the newly inserted record
        Throws:
        ApplicationException - if any exception occurs during the operation
        DuplicateRecordException - if a marksheet with the same roll number already exists

        Throws:

        public java.util.List<MarksheetBean> search​(MarksheetBean bean,
                                            int pageNo,
                                            int pageSize)
                                     throws ApplicationException
        Searches for Marksheet records based on criteria specified in the bean. Also supports pagination.
        Parameters:
        bean - the MarksheetBean with search criteria
        pageNo - current page number
        pageSize - number of records per page
        Returns:
        a list of matching MarksheetBean objects
        Throws:
        ApplicationException - if any exception occurs during the search

      • getMeritList

                                           throws ApplicationException
        Retrieves the merit list of students who passed all subjects, sorted by total marks in descending order.
        Parameters:
        pageNo - current page number
        pageSize - number of records per page
        Returns:
